title: Short-Intensive Online Learning Competency Enhancement Course for Healthcare Professionals

context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen practical competencies in the healthcare field based on blended teaching methods utilizing personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Perform clinical judgment processes with 80% or higher accuracy using virtual patient simulations
Explain emergency response procedures in healthcare settings in three or more steps through game-based learning modules
Complete two or more team-based problem-solving activities with peer learners using online collaboration tools
Produce one healthcare education content piece utilizing digital resources (infographics, podcasts, etc.)

resources: Zoom Account and Real-Time Videoconferencing Equipment
Virtual Patient Simulation Platform Access Permissions

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
